sentences.sentence: After two days at sea, it was good to be back on terra firma again.
sentences.translation: 在海上度过两天之后，又回到使人觉得坚实的陆地，真是惬意。

sentences.sentence: If EMI's fate is uncertain, the same is true of Terra Firma.
sentences.translation: 如果说百代公司的命运还不确定，Terra Firma也是一样。

sentences.sentence: Whether Terra Firma will be able to raise another fund successfully remains to be seen.
sentences.translation: 泰丰资本是否能成功筹集到其它资金仍有待观察。
